channel.title: Putting server online
channel.description: so yeah this is my first server and im running it on hamachi and it kinda sucks because people have to dl my client then they have to dl hamachi and join my network to play so i need help port forwarding i have a linksys befrs41 v3 i tryed following http://portforward.com/english/routers/port_forwarding/Linksys/BEFSR41/Runescape_Private_Server.htm and it didnt want to work for me so if any1 has any suggestions please let me know and i also have team viewer 7

yeah skype me and Ill try and get it setup ;D
